sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Analysts Are Bullish on Top Technology Stocks: Marvell (MRVL), NCR Voyix (VYX)
feed.summary: Three analysts have issued bullish ratings on technology stocks Marvell (MRVL), NCR Voyix (VYX), and Porch Group (PRCH). Oppenheimer maintained a Buy rating on Marvell with a $150 price target, while D.A. Davidson maintained a Buy rating on NCR Voyix with a $17 price target. Benchmark Co. also maintained a Buy rating on Porch Group, setting a price target of $21.

feed.title: Sapiens International (NASDAQ: SPNS) to delist after $43.50 cash deal
feed.summary: Sapiens International N.V. has finalized a cash merger, becoming a privately held subsidiary of SI Swan UK Bidco Limited and affiliates, with public shareholders receiving $43.50 per share. The company's shares are being delisted from Nasdaq and the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange, and it plans to cease SEC reporting obligations. This transaction maintains a significant rollover shareholder stake through a non-interest bearing loan note and a new holding company structure.

feed.title: |【即時新聞】Alexis Practical Tactical ETF 宣布年度股息，投資人需注意記錄日期
feed.summary: |Alexis Practical Tactical ETF (LEXI) has declared an annual dividend of $0.32 per share, payable on January 2nd next year to shareholders on record by December 31st. Investors should note that December 31st is also the ex-dividend date, meaning shares must be purchased before this date to qualify for the dividend. The ETF's share price recently closed at $36.1391, down 0.80%, with trading volume decreasing by 8.39%.

feed.title: Barclays Reaffirms Their Buy Rating on Genmab A/S (0MGB)
feed.summary: Barclays has reiterated its Buy rating on Genmab A/S (0MGB) with a price target of DKK2,500.00. The company recently reported quarterly revenues of DKK6.53 billion and a net profit of DKK401 million. The broader analyst consensus for Genmab A/S is a Moderate Buy, with an average price target of DKK2,341.67.

feed.title: BofA Sees Genmab’s 2026 Pipeline Setting Up A Big Re-Rate
feed.summary: Bank of America has raised its price target for Danish biotech Genmab to 2,500 kroner, anticipating a significant re-rating in 2026 driven by pipeline catalysts. The bank believes that three key drug readouts—Epkinly, Rina-S, and Peto—could generate approximately $6 billion in peak sales, helping to offset future declines in Darzalex royalties. This strategic shift could transform Genmab from a royalty-dependent company into a multi-asset oncology platform.

feed.title: JM Smucker (SJM) Receives a Hold from Barclays
feed.summary: Barclays analyst Andrew Lazar has maintained a Hold rating for JM Smucker (SJM) with a price target of $105.00. This follows similar ratings from Morgan Stanley, while Wells Fargo held a Buy rating. JM Smucker recently reported quarterly revenue of $2.33 billion and a net profit of $241.3 million for the period ending October 31.

feed.title: Analysts Offer Insights on Consumer Goods Companies: Kenvue, Inc. (KVUE) and McCormick & Company (MKC)
feed.summary: Analysts have issued neutral ratings for consumer goods companies Kenvue, Inc. (KVUE) and McCormick & Company (MKC), indicating neither a bullish nor bearish outlook. Barclays analyst Lauren Lieberman maintained a Hold rating on Kenvue with an $18 price target, while Barclays analyst Andrew Lazar maintained a Hold rating on McCormick with a $72 price target. Kenvue has a 'Hold' consensus, and McCormick has a 'Strong Buy' consensus despite the individual Hold ratings.

feed.title: Citizens Financial to Post Q4 Earnings: What's in Store for the Stock?
feed.summary: Citizens Financial Group (CFG) is set to announce its fourth-quarter and 2025 earnings on January 21, 2026, with expectations for increased earnings and revenues year-over-year. The report anticipates a rise in Net Interest Income, supported by stabilized funding costs and robust loan demand. While mortgage banking fees may see a slight decline, other non-interest incomes like trust and investment services and card fees are projected to rise, despite potential increases in expenses and non-accrual loans.

feed.title: FedEx Announces Filing of Form 10 Registration Statement for Planned Spin-Off of FedEx Freight
feed.summary: FedEx Corp. announced the filing of its Form 10 registration statement with the SEC for the planned spin-off of FedEx Freight, expected to be completed on June 1, 2026. This separation aims to create two independent companies, allowing both FedEx and FedEx Freight to enhance customer service and unlock long-term value for stockholders. FedEx Freight, which will become the largest North American LTL carrier, will host an investor day on April 8, 2026, to provide further details on its business and value creation strategy.

feed.title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT Bernstein Liebhard LLP Announces A Securities Fraud Class Action Lawsuit Has Been Filed Against Blue Owl Capital Inc. (NYSE:OWL)
feed.summary: Bernstein Liebhard LLP has announced a securities fraud class action lawsuit against Blue Owl Capital Inc. (NYSE: OWL) on behalf of investors who purchased shares between February 6, 2025, and November 16, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that Blue Owl made misrepresentations regarding liquidity issues. Shareholders who wish to serve as lead plaintiff must file papers by February 2, 2026.

feed.title: IBN's Q3 Earnings Dip on Higher Provision & Expenses, NII Rises Y/Y
feed.summary: ICICI Bank Ltd. (IBN) reported a 4% dip in Q3 fiscal 2026 profit after tax, primarily due to higher provisions, operating expenses, and treasury loss. Despite these challenges, the bank saw tailwinds from increased net interest income and non-interest income, alongside strong loan growth. The report also highlighted a mixed performance in credit quality and strong capital ratios, while forecasting continued pressure from rising expenses due to digitalization.

feed.title: IonQ Achieves 99.99% Accuracy in Quantum Computing, Aiming to Build Ecosystem
feed.summary: IonQ has achieved 99.99% two-gate fidelity in its quantum computing technology, leveraging trapped-ion technology and error correction to enhance qubit stability. The company aims to establish a comprehensive quantum ecosystem, positioning itself as a leader in the field through strategic acquisitions and partnerships. Despite being in an early stage with inherent risks, IonQ's market cap of around $17 billion and technological advancements make it an intriguing investment in the quantum computing space.

feed.title: Wells Fargo Expects 2026 NII to Reach $50B: What's Fueling Growth?
feed.summary: Wells Fargo projects its net interest income (NII) to reach $50 billion by 2026, driven by the lifting of its asset cap, steady loan growth, and disciplined financial management. The bank expects mid-single-digit growth in average loans and deposits by late 2026, alongside efforts to streamline operations and control expenses. This positive outlook is supported by a favorable market environment and strategic positioning, with key peers like Bank of America and Citigroup also forecasting NII growth for the same period.

feed.title: WISeKey to Host Quantum Security Summit at Davos 2026
feed.summary: WISeKey will host the "Trust and Convergence 2026: The Year of Quantum Security" summit in Davos on January 21, 2026, to discuss the impact of quantum computing on digital security and foster collaboration. Chaired by WISeKey CEO Carlos Creus Moreira, the summit will feature global leaders and experts. Discussions will cover quantum computing's disruption of trust models in finance, healthcare, and infrastructure, focusing on evolving digital identity and governance in a post-quantum world.

feed.title: Down 40%, Should You Buy the Dip on IonQ?
feed.summary: IonQ, a quantum computing company, has seen its stock drop 40% but is a leader in accuracy due to its trapped-ion approach and software technology. The company aims to build an entire quantum computing ecosystem, similar to Nvidia, and has made strategic acquisitions to further this vision. While it's a leader in the unproven quantum computing space and has upside potential, it remains a risky and expensive bet for investors.

feed.title: Infosys Sees Heavy Put Option Activity Ahead of January Expiry Amid Bearish Sentiment
feed.summary: Infosys Ltd (INFY) has experienced significant put option trading, particularly at the 1660 strike price, signaling bearish sentiment or hedging despite the stock's recent outperformance and strong technical position. This activity suggests market participants are bracing for potential short-term downside or volatility ahead of the January 27, 2026 expiry. While the company maintains a "Buy" Mojo Grade, investors are advised to monitor near-term developments closely.

feed.title: Nordea Reports Ongoing Share Buybacks Executed by Morgan Stanley Europe SE
feed.summary: Nordea Bank Abp reported that Morgan Stanley Europe SE repurchased Nordea shares on January 19, 2026, across the Helsinki, Stockholm, and Copenhagen exchanges. The buybacks, totaling multi-million euro, krona, and krone amounts, are part of Nordea's ongoing capital management efforts. These actions aim to optimize capital structure, bolster earnings per share, and signal management's confidence to shareholders.

feed.title: Converting Paper Market Growth Report: Industry Dynamics, Segmentation, and Future Potential 2026-2033 |International Paper Company, Georgia-Pacific LLC, Finch Paper LLC, Burgo Group SPA
feed.summary: The Converting Paper Market is projected to grow from USD 464.4 million in 2025 to USD 596.9 million by 2032, with a CAGR of 3.65%. A new report by Coherent Market Insights details this growth, identifying key drivers, market segmentation, and competitive landscapes. The comprehensive study aims to provide businesses with actionable insights for strategic decision-making in this expanding sector.

feed.title: Oportun Financial (NASDAQ:OPRT) Rating Lowered to Buy at Wall Street Zen
feed.summary: Oportun Financial (NASDAQ:OPRT) had its rating downgraded by Wall Street Zen from a "strong-buy" to a "buy." The stock currently has a "Hold" rating from analysts with a consensus target price of $8.50, and shares opened at $5.03. The company recently beat EPS expectations and institutional investors own approximately 82.7% of the stock.

feed.title: Welltower Stock Gains 19.4% in 6 Months: Will it Continue to Rise?
feed.summary: Welltower (WELL) stock has gained 19.4% in the last six months, outperforming its industry, driven by an aging population, rising senior healthcare expenditure, and a well-diversified portfolio in key markets. The healthcare REIT is benefiting from strong demand in its seniors housing operating portfolio (SHOP) and outpatient medical (OM) segments, alongside strategic investments and dispositions. While facing risks from competition and debt, Welltower maintains a healthy balance sheet and ample liquidity.

feed.title: Intelligent Living Application Group stock tumbles after reverse stock split By Investing.com
feed.summary: Intelligent Living Application Group Inc. (NASDAQ:ILAG) stock dropped 16.1% after announcing a one-for-ten reverse stock split to meet Nasdaq's minimum bid price requirements. The consolidation, approved by shareholders, will reduce outstanding shares and also affect preferred shares, but shareholders' percentage ownership and voting power are expected to remain largely unchanged.

feed.title: XTIA Stock Price, News & Analysis
feed.summary: XTI Aerospace, Inc. (XTIA) operates in vertical flight, unmanned aircraft systems (UAS), and real-time location technologies. The company is developing the TriFan 600 xVTOL aircraft, provides enterprise drone solutions through Drone Nerds, and offers real-time location systems via Inpixon. XTIA’s strategy focuses on combining these technologies to serve commercial, public safety, government, and industrial sectors within what it terms the "Vertical Economy."

feed.title: Morgans Reaffirms Their Buy Rating on Amcor PLC Shs Chess Depository Interests (AMC)

Amcor reported strong quarterly revenues of A$5.75 billion and net profit of A$262 million, an increase from the previous year.

feed.title: Trump Imposes Tariffs, Boosting Greenland Investment Interest for Critical Metals
feed.summary: Former President Trump's announcement of tariffs on European countries opposing his Greenland acquisition has intensified U.S. interest in Greenland's critical metals. This development, coupled with Critical Metals' new joint venture in Saudi Arabia for rare-earth processing, has led to an 18% surge in the company's stock and a significant shift to "extremely bullish" sentiment among investors, according to Stocktwits data. Critical Metals, with its key projects in Greenland and Austria, is strategically positioned to supply essential minerals for defense, clean energy, and technology sectors amidst rising market optimism.

feed.title: ICICI Bank Ltd. Sees Robust Value Trading and Institutional Interest Amid Market Recovery
feed.summary: ICICI Bank Ltd. emerged as a top-traded stock by value on January 20, 2026, showcasing strong investor confidence and institutional buying. The stock outperformed its sector and the Sensex, reversing a three-day losing streak and seeing a significant increase in delivery volumes. This renewed interest and an upgrade in its MarketsMOJO rating from Sell to Hold suggest a potential recovery, though investors are advised to monitor technical indicators.

feed.title: Nvidia Corporation (NVDA) Jefferies Raises Target Forecast to $275
feed.summary: Jefferies has increased its 12-month price target for Nvidia (NVDA) stock to $275 from $250, while reaffirming a "Buy" rating. This adjustment reflects confidence in Nvidia's leadership in AI and data center acceleration, driven by strong demand for AI GPUs and expanding adoption in hyperscale and enterprise sectors. Despite geopolitical and supply chain uncertainties, the firm sees robust long-term growth for the company.

feed.title: AWM Capital LLC Has $57.04 Million Holdings in Dimensional Emerging Markets Core Equity 2 ETF $DFEM
feed.summary: AWM Capital LLC increased its stake in the Dimensional Emerging Markets Core Equity 2 ETF (DFEM) by 3.2% in the third quarter, bringing its total holdings to 1,778,492 shares valued at $57.04 million. This investment now represents 5.2% of AWM Capital's portfolio and makes DFEM its 6th largest position. Other institutional investors like Comerica Bank, Pinnacle Bancorp Inc., and First United Bank & Trust also adjusted their holdings in the ETF.

feed.title: Assessing IBM (NYSE:IBM) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength And Long Term Returns
feed.summary: International Business Machines (IBM) has seen significant share price strength, with a 39.49% return over one year and 231.94% over five years, closing recently at $305.67. Simply Wall St's analysis suggests IBM is currently 4% overvalued, with a fair value estimate of $293.89, based on its focused strategy in hybrid cloud and AI driving revenue growth. While the company's initiatives like the z17 mainframe are positive, potential pressure points include softer Red Hat performance and currency fluctuations.

feed.title: Fuel Tech Inc: Niche Clean?Air Player Caught Between Speculation And Reality
feed.summary: Fuel Tech Inc. (FTEK) stock is experiencing low volatility and thin newsflow, trading near its 52-week low. Investors are left to determine if the micro-cap emissions specialist is consolidating value or drifting towards irrelevance, as there's no fresh Wall Street coverage or significant news. The company's future prospects depend on regulatory developments, its ability to secure major contracts, and its strategy to diversify revenue streams.

Analysts currently rate GPRK as a "Hold," with recent upgrades from Zacks and Weiss Ratings.

feed.title: BlackRock Gets Nod to Extend Asia Credit Fund by Another Year
feed.summary: BlackRock Inc. has secured investor approval to extend the investment period for its second Asia private credit fund, the BlackRock Asia Pacific Private Credit Opportunities Fund II, for an additional year. Starting in January, the fund will be allowed to deploy up to $135 million in new investments, providing flexibility in navigating the region's private markets. This extension highlights BlackRock's continued strategic focus on Asia's credit opportunities amidst evolving market conditions.

feed.title: BWX Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:BWXT) Sees Significant Growth in Short Interest
feed.summary: BWX Technologies (NYSE:BWXT) experienced a significant 19.6% increase in short interest during December, reaching 2,747,394 shares, which represents about 3.0% of its shares sold short. This surge in short interest comes after the company reported strong Q4 results, surpassing analyst estimates with $1.00 EPS and $866.3 million in revenue, and issued optimistic FY2025 guidance. The stock has seen price appreciation, trading near its one-year high, while also recently announcing a quarterly dividend and receiving mixed analyst ratings with an average "Moderate Buy."

feed.title: Is Waters Corporation the Quiet Wall Street Cheat Code Everyone’s Sleeping On?
feed.summary: The article discusses Waters Corporation (WAT) as a potentially overlooked investment opportunity compared to trendy AI stocks. It highlights Waters' critical role in providing lab instruments and software for the pharmaceutical, biotech, and food safety industries, emphasizing its stable demand, recurring revenue streams, and high barriers to entry. The author suggests Waters is a "grown-up" science infrastructure play for long-term, fundamentals-focused investors rather than those seeking viral, short-term gains.

feed.title: Coeur Mining, Inc. (NYSE:CDE) Sees Large Growth in Short Interest

feed.title: IGLD: Exploit The Momentum And The Implied Volatility Of Gold
feed.summary: The article discusses the FT Vest Gold Strategy Target Income ETF (IGLD), an ETF designed to generate income from gold by using a synthetic covered call strategy. IGLD aims to capture partial upside from GLD price movements and benefit from increased implied volatility (GVZ). While the current market conditions present a potentially stimulating environment for IGLD's returns, investors should be aware of the full downside participation in case of a drawdown, where premiums might not be maintained.

feed.title: Short Interest in Oxford Industries, Inc. (NYSE:OXM) Rises By 19.7%

Despite beating Q4 EPS and revenue estimates, the company issued weak FY2025 guidance, leading analysts to rate the stock as a "Reduce" with an average price target of $45.40. feed.title: What To Expect From Live Oak Bancshares's (LOB) Q4 Earnings
